Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at The Hollywood Roosevelt have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking. There's an in-house bar and guests can also use the business area. Capitol Records Building is a 19-minute walk from The Hollywood Roosevelt, while Hollywood Bowl is 1.1 miles from the property. Warm woods and light blues recall the beach—just down the street—while quirky design elements and colorful Terrazzo add a playful punch. Rooms are serene and light-filled, with Aesop amenities, luxurious linens, and views of the beach and the Santa Monica mountains from some rooms. The buzzed-about rooftop restaurant draws guests and locals for poolside snacks, cocktails, and more elaborate dining affairs.Marriott

Suites offer separate living rooms, dining/meeting tables, wet bars, and marble bathrooms. Standard suites include an open floor plan with plenty of living space and the hotel also offers 1 to 3-bedroom specialty suites. All suites provide mirrored closets and a vanity, a walk-in shower with 2 shower heads and a soak tub. Most suites also include a balcony with views. Many larger suites also boast completely separate seating areas with wet bars and walk-in closets. The property's complimentary breakfast includes pastries, bagels & lox, cheeses, charcuterie, yogurt parfaits, fresh juices, coffee & tea, cereals, and other seasonal varieties. The London West Hollywood also provides guests with a fitness center. The 24-hour facilities include cardio equipment, Life Fitness machines and an outdoor yoga area. Guests can also visit the on-site salon for hair styling, nail, & makeup services. Cabanas can be rented at the pool area and are equipped with mini-bars. Guests can order from the property bar as well. Beverly Hills and the Beverly Center Mall are 4 minutes’ drive away. The Hollywood Walk of Fame and Melrose Avenue shopping are just 10 minutes’ drive away. West Hollywood is a great choice for travelers interested in nightlife, restaurants, design and clothes shopping.

In town for a concert, we are only minutes away from Universal Studios, Greek Theatre, and Nokia Theatre L.A. Live. Keep connected while exploring or working, stay in touch at the complimentary 24-hour business center or host a training seminar or event in the meeting room totaling 546 sq. ft. Pick up essentials at the Pavilion Pantry convenience mart. Work out at the fully equipped fitness center. Enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool or a soak in the heated whirlpool. Stay fresh with the hotel laundry facilities. This hotel serves tasty American favorites at the Garden Grille, with a special kids menu and offers freshly-prepared evening room service. Sip drinks in the Reel Lounge. With friendly and attentive staff, comfortable accommodations, and central location the Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood is the perfect location.Hilton

name: Sunset Tower Hotel

description: The Sunset Tower Hotel hotel is located in West Hollywood on the Sunset Strip, 2.5 mi from the Hollywood Walk of Fame. It features a rooftop pool that provides panoramic city views and a full-service spa. Spacious guest rooms offer free WiFi and floor-to-ceiling windows with views. The modern rooms at Sunset Tower Hotel offer flat-screen TVs, iPod docks, Nespresso coffee machines, & mini-bars.Nightly turndown service includes freshly baked cookies. Guests at The Sunset Tower Hotel can take advantage of the on-site fitness center and the reputable Joanna Vargas Spa. It offers a wide array of skincare and body treatments. The Tower Bar serves California cuisine with French and Italian influence. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city or enjoy the restaurant’s outdoor terrace. The poolside dining offers a more casual ambiance for the hotel’s guests. This hotel is 14 minutes' drive from the University of California-Los Angeles and 8 minutes' drive from Los Angeles Country Club. Downtown Los Angeles is 8.1 mi away.

The hotel offers a rooftop pool terrace with a pool, a tennis court, and cabanas. An on-site restaurant is also available. All rooms and suites at The Montrose feature an HDTV, a fireplace, a hairdryer, a refrigerator, and a fully stocked mini-bar. Most suites include a balcony and some offer a kitchenette. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Rooftop poolside dining is also available for those looking to eat a lighter meal outside. Other rooftop amenities include a full seasonal bar that overlooks Hollywood and a regulation-sized tennis court. Guests can also enjoy a welcome beverage, two complimentary bottles of welcome water, morning coffee & tea, and a fitness center. Notable venues such as Whiskey A Go Go, The Roxy Theater, & Soho House are within 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Rodeo Drive & Beverly Hills are 5 minutes’ drive away.

From the sculptural walls to a dramatic feather chandelier, the hotel evokes a quintessential West Hollywood style. Located in one of LA most walkable neighborhoods, near Beverly Hills, Kimpton La Peer Hotel features 105 guest rooms and suites, heated pool, more than 8,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor event space, and Mediterranean fare from one of LA's most well known chefs.IHG Hotels & Resorts

All hotel collect reservations must check in by 10 pm the latest. Late check in may be arranged by either making a prepaid  reservation or by contacting the hotel front desk at least 3 days prior to arrival date for instructions on how to transfer funds to Hotel's Corp Bank Account.

The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 8.7 miles from Seaway Motel.

A refrigerator and mini-bar are available in all rooms. World-class dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner is available at the Belvedere restaurant. The Belvedere is a lively European Brasserie showcasing award-winning cuisine in a warm and inviting environment. The adjacent outdoor terrace space is a destination for al fresco dining under the glittering Beverly Hills evening sky. A large rooftop outdoor pool and a modern gym with personal coaches are available. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Upon check-in guests can enjoy free fresh fruit and a welcome beverage. Shoe shining services are available. The University of California Los Angeles is 2.5 mi from The Peninsula. Universal Studios is 8.3 mi away.

Guests can utilize the on-site business center, meeting and conference rooms, and an outdoor pool and free WiFi is also provided. The hotel also provides guests with free parking and other business amenities. Guests can take advantage of the on-site laundry and safety deposit boxes as well. The front desk can aid in arranging taxi service to Los Angeles International Airport. Several restaurants and markets are within close proximity to the property.

description: Including free WiFi, the Travel Inn is just 105 feet from Kountry Folks Restaurant and 20 minutes’ drive from Hollywood Bowl. A 24-hour reception is featured. The motel is 4.9 mi from Los Angeles County Museum Of Art (LACMA), and 4.3 mi away from the Los Angeles International Airport.

name: Downtown Los Angeles Proper Hotel, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Downtown L.A. Proper is housed in a landmark Curlett & Beelman Renaissance Revival building from the 1930's. Today its 148 rooms and suites, masterfully transformed by Kelly Wearstler, marry Mexican modernism with elements from France and Morocco, and original works by local artists. Two dining establishments are helmed by James Beard Award-winning chef Suzanne Goin and Caroline Styne, a split-level rooftop pool-deck offers panoramic views of the city, and 14,000 square feet of event spaces, including a suite fashioned from a vintage basketball court and another incorporating an indoor pool, make for memorable gatherings.Marriott

name: Hyland Motel Van Nuys
description: Located just 0.5 miles from Interstate 405, this motel is 2.2 miles from Van Nuys Airport. It features free Wi-Fi access and an on-site car rental desk. The Sepulveda Basin Wildlife Preserve is 1.8 miles away.

name: Moxy Downtown Los Angeles
address: 1260 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Reflecting the bold, adventurous spirit of California, Moxy Downtown Los Angeles is a haven for modern nomads in LA’s creative epicenter. Our location on Figueroa Street is steps away from the LA Convention Center and Crypto.com Arena, formerly Staples Center. Brought to life by an all-star team of architecture and interior design firms, the 380-room hotel channels the neighborhood’s forward-thinking energy and multicultural heritage. The hotel’s 12 dining and entertainment options include Level 8, a collection of restaurants, bars, and lounges that highlight DTLA’s diverse cultures and cuisines, and a rooftop bar on the 34th floor with views that sweep all the way to the Hollywood Hills. 4 outdoor terraces overlook the LA skyline, and flexible, tech-centric spaces foster co-working, meetings, and large social events. Floor-to-ceiling windows light up the smartly designed and affordable bedrooms, and a playful, cheeky attitude fuels the imagination.Marriott

name: Hotel Bel-Air - Dorchester Collection
address: 701 Stone Canyon Road, Los Angeles, CA 90077

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Los Downtown Los Angeles
address: 1260 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles places guests in the heart of downtown Los Angeles near LA Live and the LA Convention Center. Our hotel blends the AC brand’s timeless Spanish heritage with the artistic soul of Los Angeles, CA. Revel in artful designs from Yabu Pushelberg, who have created an elegant atelier for thinkers and doers. Find ample space and floor-to-ceiling windows in our 347 ethereal hotel rooms, which each provide a serene place to live, work, create and recharge. Visit a warm, light-filled bar and lounge or head on up to our hotel's 34th-floor rooftop garden with sweeping views of Los Angeles. Dial up the fun factor in DTLA, with 11 additional restaurants, bars and clubs, plus three outdoor terraces. It's all found just an elevator ride away at AC Hotel Downtown Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Best Western Burbank Airport Inn
description: The Best Western Burbank Airport Inn is just minutes away from the Burbank Airport and NoHo Art District. The hotel is located near Universal Studios® and the nightlife of Universal City Walk. We are conveniently located close to a variety of all major attractions including Hollywood, NBC Studios®, The Walt Disney® Studios and Warner Bros® Studios, Beverly Hills and Six Flags® Magic Mountain. Within close proximity are several major shopping centers, corporate offices, comedy clubs, and restaurants offering different types of cuisines from exotic to old fashioned home style cooking. Attentive Best Western service and the prime location attract sophisticated business and leisure travelers. Business travelers may want to take advantage of free high-speed Internet access in all rooms and use of the onsite copy and fax services. Stay refreshed in our comfortable and beautifully decorated rooms with amenities such as hairdryer, iron and ironing boards, microwave with refrigerator, flat screen television and coffee makers. Euro top mattresses covered with luxurious duvets will provide our guests with an at home feel. Please note, parking is limited. In order to accommodate all guests, vehicles double parked or otherwise blocking other vehicles will be required to leave their keys with the front desk agent on duty for assisted parking. For details and for size restrictions for oversize vehicles please check with the hotel. A valid credit card is required to be authorized for the incidental deposit of $100 per stay.bestwestern.com

description: Located in West Hollywood (Norma Triangle), Chamberlain West Hollywood is within a 10-minute walk of Sunset Strip and Whiskey a Go Go. name: L'Ermitage Beverly Hills
description: Established in 1975 on a palm-lined residential boulevard, L’Ermitage is a discreet, luxurious getaway located a stone’s throw from the beating heart of Beverly Hills. As the first all-suite hotel in the nation, L’Ermitage is committed to offering travelers 5-star service, excellence in hospitality, and spacious accommodations. Our 116 suites preserve the residential elegance of the hotel’s original design while providing guests with a range of spacious layouts and modern appointments. Inside, guests will find luxurious walk-through dressing rooms with ample wardrobe space, full-length triptych mirrors with warm adjustable lighting, and generous vanities that evoke a sense of old Hollywood glamor. We offer flexible check-in and check-out, and ask our guests to provide estimated arrival time so we can accomodate their arrival time request. L'Ermitage has a complimentary car service available to our guests daily in our BMW 5-Series in a 2 mile radius. The property offers charging stations for eco-friendly cars as well as two TESLA charging stations. Guests at the L'Ermitage Beverly Hills can use the modern fitness center or have a drink at the trendy Lounge. Brunch and dinner are served at the hotel's Avec Nous restaurant. The Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the University of California are within a short drive of L'Ermitage Beverly Hills. The Los Angeles Convention Center is also nearby.

A 24-hour reception, concierge and room services are provided for guests at the Huntley. Dry cleaning, shoe shine, and airport transfers are also offered with an additional surcharge. We make it a priority to accommodate your every need. Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites is located next to many attractions including all the beach cities from Redondo Beach, Manhattan Beach and Santa Monica Pier. We are near many of the prime locations Los Angeles has to offer from Hollywood to Universal Studios, Beverly Hills to downtown Los Angeles and more. We are also just a short ride away from the new home of the LA Rams & Chargers who will be playing games at the brand new SoFi Staduim. Make a reservation at the Best Western Plus Gardena Inn & Suites and see everything the city of Los Angeles has to offer.bestwestern.com

RH, the West Hollywood Andaz’s onsite restaurant. features seasonal California cuisine. The restaurant works to highlight “market to table” dishes. RH Bar is a chic evening space serving signature cocktails and appetizers. Guests can enjoy The Sundeck for poolside dining with fresh, light options. A business center and fitness center are available for guest use. The Beverly Plaza is 2 mi away from the hotel. Hollywood is 3.1 mi from the property.

name: Diamond Inn

name: Quality Inn Lomita-Los Angeles South Bay

If you are looking for a more for your money hotel in Lomita, the 100 per cent smoke free Quality Inn Lomita-Los Angeles South Bay is always a reasonably priced option. Amenities include free WiFi, free Grab and Go breakfast, free parking and an outdoor pool. Guest rooms feature a microwave, refrigerator and flat-screen TV. We are located on the beautiful Pacific Coast Highway at the base of the Rancho Palos Verdes Peninsula. L.A. is nearby, as are attractions like the Lomita Railroad Museum, Los Angeles Waterfront, Hermosa Beach, Redondo Beach Pier and the Battleship USS Iowa Museum. You can also earn rewards like gift cards and free nights when you join our Choice Privileges program.Choice Hotels

name: Santa Monica Proper Hotel
description: Santa Monica Proper introduces a more laid back kind of luxury to Santa Monica. Here, within walking distance to the beach, each of the 267 guestrooms and spaces successfully harnesses the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design pays homage to the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper tempts guests with the only rooftop pool deck on the Westside, a singular vantage point for sunsets over the Pacific that includes a Balearic restaurant, bar, and cabanas, while the landmark Onda restaurant, marks a synergistic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. Taking Eastern-inspired wellness as a guide, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening in winter), presided over by internationally renowned Ayurvedic guru Martha Soffer, offers tailored holistic health programs. Anything less just wouldn't be Proper.Marriott

name: Hilton Santa Monica Hotel & Suites
description: Welcome to the Hilton Santa Monica Hotel & Suites, located in the heart of sunny Santa Monica, California. Walking distance from trendy Santa Monica Beach and Pier and minutes from Third Street Promenade, Venice Beach and Malibu Beach. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is just 11 miles away. Hilton Santa Monica Hotel & Suites offers spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean, friendly service and an unbeatable location with easy access to the Santa Monica Freeway and Southern California's most popular destinations like Rodeo Drive, The Getty Museum, Universal Studios, Westwood, Century City, UCLA, Hollywood and Pepperdine University. Subtle coastal influences make their way into the property’s guest rooms utilizing a serene color palette, inviting layout, and bright, spacious bathrooms. Every guest room has a flexible layout with modular furniture to seamlessly cater to a variety of guest needs and allowing each guest to optimize their room. A large, round focal table instantly transforms from a dining table to impromptu workstation when slid under the tech console. A generously scaled sleeper sofa maximizes comfort and provides additional sleeping accommodations when needed. Each bedroom features a chic, contemporary, and comfortable bed with integrated headboard sconces that are operated with a quick touch to the tech panel incorporated into the headboard. Floor-to-ceiling black out drapery ensure a restful night sleep for all guests – truly an experience you dream of long after your stay is over. With about 70 percent of the hotel being Suites, every guest is a VIP at the Hilton Santa Monica Hotel & Suites. We offer 10,000 sq. ft. feet of flexible meeting and banquet space, beautiful terrace garden courtyard, reliable WiFi in guest suites and public areas (fee applies), valet parking, outdoor pool and whirlpool, fully equipped fitness center, golf course nearby at Riviera Country Club, full-service restaurant and bar, market place, in-room dining, tech lounge, and concierge desk. Hilton Honors members can earn both points and miles for every qualifying stay through the award-winning Hilton Honors program.Hilton

name: The Beverly Hilton
description: The Beverly Hilton, a Forbes four star hotel, combines the excitement of Old Hollywood with the unparalleled elegance of Beverly Hills. Nestled in the heart of the entertainment capital of the world, we offer our guests the opportunity to become fully immersed in the grandeur of this world-class city. From shopping to dining to entertainment opportunities in the Greater Los Angeles area, we offer our guests easy access to all that they could possibly ask for and more, including: Rodeo Drive - World-famous shops and boutiques, renowned for their exceptional high-end offerings and celebrity clientele. Santa Monica Pier - Extending out over the ocean in beautiful Santa Monica, the Pier offers rides, games, and entertainment fun for the whole family. 3rd Street Promenade - Outdoor shopping and dining exclusively for walkers and located a mere three blocks from Santa Monica’s beaches. Staples Center - The home of the Los Angeles Kings (NHL), the Los Angeles Clippers (NBA), and the Los Angeles Lakers. Grauman's Chinese Theater. Paul Getty Center - An architecturally stunning museum that rests high above Sunset Boulevard and houses collections by some of the world’s greatest artists. Griffith Park Observatory, Hollywood Sign, Universal Studios.The hotel features 569 luxuriously-appointed guest rooms and suites, each of which offers a unique perspective on this great city. All of our accommodations offer the finest in creature comforts, including: Plasma screen televisions, Bose Wave music systems, Lodgenet high-definition programming, L'Occitane bath amenities, European linens, Access to high-speed Internet and Wi-Fi.At the hotel, we appreciate that no two guests are alike. The Bellezza Salon, Accents Gift Shop, AVT Event Technologies and Business Center, 24-hour automated business center, Midway Car Rental. This hotel offers over 60,000 square feet of meeting space in 22 venues, each with its own distinct personality and atmosphere. Our Events and Catering teams are on-hand to ensure that every event surpasses our guests’ expectations. Our full meeting and event offerings include: Executive Meeting Center - Offering 11 breakout rooms opening onto a single corridor, the EMC allows for smooth transitions from meeting to meeting. It's ideal for groups of 100 or less. description: Located directly on the beach, this Santa Monica, California resort features 2 oceanfront restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. Providing luxury white linens, every room offers plush bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries at Shutters On The Beach. Styled in hardwood floors with a refined Tibetan rug, each room provides an iPod docking station and a 42-inch flat-screen TV. An in-room library is offered. Select rooms offer a balcony and select rooms offer spacious spa bathtubs. Boasting a panoramic ocean view and an oversize elegant white fireplace, One Pico offers seasonal cuisine on intimate tables with blue plush chairs. The beachfront café, Coast offers a casual atmosphere with a bar and lite bites. Featuring a heated terrace with an ocean view, the Living Room features afternoon tea, cocktails and a full menu of freshly prepared morsels. A poolside outdoor hot tub is offered. Valet parking is provided. A gift shop is also available at Sutter On the Beach Santa Monica. Santa Monica Pier is just 5 minutes’ walk down the beach. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away from Shutters On The Beach.

name: SureStay Hotel by Best Western Santa Monica
description: The SureStay by Best Western Santa Monica has 82 newly renovated modern rooms. It is located approximately 11 miles from Los Angeles International Airport and two and a half miles from Santa Monica beaches, pier, and Third Street Promenade. Three and half miles from Venice Beach Boardwalk, five miles from Beverly Hills and Marina Del Rey, 10 miles from Hollywood and 19 miles from Universal Studios® Hollywood. Hotel amenities include a courtyard with BBQ and picnic area, complimentary deluxe continental breakfast, free parking, free Wi-Fi, free local calls, voicemail, free weekday newspapers, complimentary evening snacks. Most rooms have refrigerators and microwaves. All rooms have large HDTVs with movie and news channels, hairdryers, clock radios, coffee makers, iron and ironing board. There are 4 electrical car charging stations available for hotel guests free of charge.bestwestern.com

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Los Angeles Airport Hawthorne
description: Just Minutes from LAX! The Holiday Inn Express & Suites LAX Hawthorne hotel is just a few miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). Our Hawthorne hotel is easily accessible to major freeways 405 and 105. We are centrally located to major Los Angeles attractions like Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, Universal Studios, Hollywood Walk of Fame and Magic Mountain. Come and visit nearby beautiful beaches like Santa Monica, Venice and Manhattan and soak up the California sun! Experience great shopping at the nearby South Bay Galleria and Del Amo Mall. Our hotel is home to many prominent businesses and corporate headquarters, including Northrop Grumman, Mattel, Boeing, Raytheon, Los Angeles Air force, SpaceX, OSI Systems and FedEx which are easily accessible. Our 120-room hotel near LAX offers the fastest and most reliable free Wi-Fi in the city! To help you stay fit, our hotel features a 24-hour complimentary Fitness Center. Our state-of-the-art meeting space can facilitate any of your business or social event needs. On the road with no laptop? Don't worry. You can print directions to local attractions and your next boarding pass in our complimentary Business Center. After shopping and sightseeing, relax in our pool and soak up the sun! Start your morning smart at the hottest free breakfast bar in town!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Maywood Inn
description: Located in Maywood, within 7.6 miles of LA Union Station and 8 miles of LA Memorial Coliseum, Maywood Inn provides accommodations with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 8.1 miles from California Science Center, 8.6 miles from Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County and 9.2 miles from Staples Center. Microsoft Theater is 9.2 miles from the motel and Dodger Stadium is 10 miles away. All guest rooms at the motel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. At Maywood Inn every room has bed linen and towels. With staff speaking English, Spanish and Chinese, around-the-clock guidance is available at the reception. California Institute of Technology is 13 miles from the accommodation, while Los Angeles County Museum Of Art (LACMA) is 15 miles away.

name: Geneva Motel
description: This motel in Inglewood, California is 2.5 mi from Los Angeles International Airport. The motel provides free WiFi and each room includes cable TV with a seating area. Each room at Geneva Motel is furnished with a microwave and a refrigerator. Venice Beach is 10 mi from the Motel Geneva. The Forum, an indoor arena, is 472 feet away.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Torrance
description: Free Wireless High Speed Internet Access. Buffet Breakfast. Torrance Airport Nearby. 1 Mile from Del Amo Fashion Center. Across the street from 24 Hour Fitness Center, Shopping Center and Restaurants. Guest Laundry. Golf Course Nearby. 3 Miles from Redondo Beach Pier. Free Weekday USA Today. In room safes in all rooms at no charge. Outdoor Swimming Pool. Pet Friendly. Shanghai Palace Restaurant On Site. Guest rooms feature Sealy Posturepedic mattresses and new plush pillows. Incidental deposit is USD 100.00Wyndham

name: The Maybourne Beverly Hills
address: 225 North Canon Drive, Beverly Hills, CA 90210
description: This Beverly Hills hotel offers a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available and Frette bathrobes are provided. Crypto.Com Arena is a 20 minute drive away. A 42-inch flat-screen satellite TV is included in all guest rooms at The Maybourne Beverly Hills. All guestrooms provide guests with 24/7 access to all of the hotel's amenities and offerings. A seating area is also included and guests can enjoy slippers in the private bathroom. The Terrace, complete with a large outdoor dining patio overlooking Beverly Canon Gardens, serves California-inspired cuisine and guests can enjoy a cocktail at the Maybourne Bar. The on-site spa includes a sauna and a hot tub at no cost. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), the SoFi Stadium and the Hollywood Bowl are a 30 minute drive away.

name: Best Western Los Angeles Worldport Hotel
address: 1402 West Pacific Coast Highway, Los Angeles, CA 90744-1803
description: Stay at this Wilmington hotel located right off the 110 Freeway and enjoy a host of convenient amenities while traveling in southern California. The Best Western Los Angeles Worldport Hotel is well situated for both business and leisure travelers near the Long Beach Convention Center, the Queen Mary and the Long Beach Aquarium of the Pacific. Families will especially enjoy a trip to Disneyland®, Universal Studios® Hollywood or Knott's Berry Farm® amusement park, all just a short drive from the hotel. Guests will also appreciate the variety of nearby dining options including Ports o Call Restaurant, 22 St Landing Seafood Grill and shopping center at Del Amo Fashion Center. Each well-appointed room in this Wilmington hotel features free high-speed Internet access, free long distance access, an iron/ironing board, coffee/tea maker and hairdryer. All guests can begin the morning with a complimentary continental breakfast and newspaper. Visitors will also enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. A friendly staff is prepared to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay. Make an online reservation today at this Wilmington hotel! Enjoy your stay. Long-term parking is only available with a package plan.bestwestern.com

name: The Ritz-Carlton Los Angeles
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Set within vibrant downtown surroundings, The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles effortlessly embodies the timeless appeal of a legendary city. Located at L.A. LIVE, home to world-class sports and extraordinary live entertainment, our luxury hotel in Los Angeles, CA features a captivating atmosphere shaped by dynamic surroundings. Discover a singular sense of place through luxurious accommodations, dramatic downtown L.A. skyline views, relaxing spa services and imaginative cuisine, all enhanced by unparalleled local access. This is where the free spirit of southern California combines with the discerning sophistication of Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
address: 300 South Doheny Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90048
description: Located in the center of Los Angeles this luxurious, full-service hotel provides rooms with French doors opening to private balconies. This 5-star hotel features a full-service spa and outdoor pool. These air conditioned rooms at the Four Seasons Los Angeles at Beverly Hills offer views of the gardens, Hollywood Hills, Los Angeles or Beverly Hills. They are furnished with a living area and cable TV, a DVD player and iPod docking station. On-site dining provides guests with indoor or outdoor seating options and specializes in Italian cuisine. Cocktails are available at Windows Lounge located in the Four Seasons Los Angeles. Los Angeles Four Seasons at Beverly Hills features a library and gym. Guests can relax in the sauna or use the business center. Rodeo Drive and Melrose Avenue are within walking distance from the Four Seasons at Beverly Hills. Downtown Los Angeles is 11 mi away.
